programme.title: UEFA Europa League Football
programme.desc: Unai Emery's Aston Villa look to make it three wins on the spin in all competitions as they travel to face Robin van Persie's Feyenoord in the UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: UEFA Europa League Football
programme.desc: Rangers travel to face Austrian champions Sturm Graz at Merkur-Arena. Sturm Graz were 2-0 winners when these sides last met in Europe back in 2000.

programme.desc: Celtic seek their first win of the league phase as they host Portuguese side Braga at Celtic Park. The visitors are winless in their last five league games.
